thread.title: love this hotel
thread.title_full: love this hotel - Review of Hotel Original Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Hancchich
title: love this hotel
text: We've just returned from a three night stay here...loved it. The staff were so friendly and helpful, even printing off tickets for Disneyland for us. The room was stunning, a massive comfy bed and a large bathtub in the room. We had the best break away here, and got engaged on this trip so this hotel will always hold very special memories for us
